# Donate

### Don Wordpress Plugins needs your support

It is hard to continue development and support for the plugins without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using our plugin's and find it useful, please consider making a donation. Your donation will help encourage and support the plugin's continued development and better user support.

### Donate via PayPal
